org.apache.hc.core5.http.pool.io

Class BasicPoolEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hc.core5.pool.PoolEntry<HttpHost,HttpClientConnection>
      • org.apache.hc.core5.http.pool.io.BasicPoolEntry

  • @Contract(threading=SAFE_CONDITIONAL)
public class BasicPoolEntry
extends PoolEntry<HttpHost,HttpClientConnection>
    A very basic PoolEntry implementation that represents an entry in a pool of blocking HttpClientConnections identified by an HttpHost instance.
    Since:
    4.2
    See Also:
    HttpHost

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BasicPoolEntry(String id, HttpHost route, HttpClientConnection conn) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Invalidates the pool entry and closes the pooled connection associated with it.
      boolean isClosed()
      Returns true if the pool entry has been invalidated.
